data.text: Wɛlɛ Salomɔn ná-tɛnɛ faalaalii tanigaani ba mɔnɔ, niiti Zuda masagi Ezekiase ná-nuiti ti ti ɠaalɛɛni ba.
Ada GALA dɛbizu tɔɔzei dɔɔɠuzu vaiti ba, é ti ɠɛɛzu,
Ade la kwɛɛ, geei wuzeɠeʋɛ é ɠwɛ mini, ɓaa mini ɠa zooi ɓomaʋɛ ɠwɛgai ná.
Ni nu a wali ɠaei ma nɔɠɔiti kulana ba,
Ni nu a faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti kpɛɛna masagi maaɠoolii zu,
Mina ɓɔɠɔ wɔɔlɔ masagi ɠaazu,
Mazɔlɔɔ fizɔgɛ ti ɠɛ ma: «Ʋa è zei unfema zeizuʋɛ,»
Nii ɗa ka, naa mina ɠɛ ga zaɓu, è ʋa suvilɛ ga nu loliga tukpɔɠaaleʋezu.
Ni kpɔɛ a ɠɛna wo yɔɠɔzu wa è-zeiɲɔɠɔi, a gaaɠula ba wa tɔ,
Tɔɔzei a mɛnina, toɠa è ʋoomu,
Kpɔɛi maaɓɛtɛai ga pagɔ, naa wola ʋagɛ,
Zɔi é woilosu ɠima nui ná-tɛnɛ gooi ma ga pagɔ,
Molo leʋe voloi ma liegi zu, ziɛ lɛi ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga nu yiilɛi ganii.
Nui é wasosu ga faanɛɛ ɠɛɛ vai, tama é la kɛɛzu,
Maaɓɔungi ɠa nu a ɗa vɔni da kundiɠii ma,
Ɗa kɔin gulɔi ɠaana, kɔmɔ nɔ ga è-ma liegɔi,
Mina ɗa ga laali è-zeiɲɔɠɔi ma valafala, ni naa laade,
Nui a zɛɛ zeele wooi wona, seiɲɔɠɔi laalɔɠɔma,
È ɠito yaava nui ʋa, kidaaʋili foloi,
È guyei loo nui ʋɛ, nii ziizoolɛzu,
Ni pului ɠa è zili nui ma, daamianigi ve zea, é mi,
Mazɔlɔɔ abulekaiti kana è puuzu unmaʋɛ,
Lɛkpɛmaʋɛ nu ɠɔʋɛzu ʋele viilɛi ɠa ɗa ʋa ga tonai,
Fizɔgɛ nu zei fiilɛ zosuʋɛ sokogi zu pɛlɛ ɠɔmaʋɛ,
Keela woo ʋagɔi é ʋaazu, é zeɠe ɠoozama,
Telebo nui é ɓɔɠɔ yɛsu ná, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠaazumaayiki ma,
É la ʋani ga nu kɔin gulɔi ɠɔmɔ ga gola,
Taa wolai maaɠɔkɔ zobo ge la ná,
